It‘s hard to feel positive when our kids: Go thata go ikutlwa ona le bomolemo fa bana kana basha ba rona ba sa re tsee sentle. Gantsi rena le go ba raya rere "Emisa go dira jalo!" Mme bana ba tshabelelwa ke go dira se ba kopiwang go se dira bogolo jang fa ba fiwa ditaelo tse di molemo le go galalediwa thata mo go se ba se dirang sentle.
Say the behaviour you want to see: Bua boitshwaro jo o batlang go bo bona
Use positive words when telling your chi: Dirisa mafoko a a molemo fa o bolelela ngwana wa gago se a tshwanetseng go se dira;-jaaka 'Tsweetswee fapha diaparo tsa gago
It’s all in the delivery: Tshwanelo ke go neela puo ka tlotlo
Shouting at your child will just make yo: Go tsosetsa ngwana wa gago modumo go ka go okeletsa kgatelelo maikutlo le bogale. Gapa kgatlhego ya ngwana wa gago ka go dirisa leina la gagwe. Bua ka lentswe le le ritibetseng.
Can your child actually do what you are: A ngwana wa gago o dira se a kopiwang go se dira? Go thata gore ngwana a didimale sebaka sa letsatsi lotlhe mme go a diragala gore ba didimale metsotso ele lesome le botlhano fa o le mo mogaleng
Praise your child when they are behaving: Galaletsa ngwana wa gago fa a itshola sentle
Try praising your child or teenager for: Leka go galaletsa ngwana wa gago kana mosha mo sengweng se a se dirang sentle. Ba ka tlhoka go supa boipelo, mme o tlaa ba bona ba dira se se molemo gape. Se seka ba tlhomamisetsa fa ba elwa tlhoko ebile ba kgathalelwa.
Help your teen stay connected: Thusa monana wa gago gore a ikgolaganye a buisane le ba bangwe
Teens especially need to be able to comm: Basha bogolo jang ba tlhoka go nna ba buisana le ditsala tsa bone. Thusa ngwana wa gago go golagana mo maranyaneng jaaka mogala lemo ditseleng tse dingwe tsa kiletso kgobokano e e babalesegileng. Se loka se dira mmogo, ka tshwanelo!
